name: iptv.memorial
description: Utilities for parsing iptv.memorial channels.m3u and epg.xml

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require node-env-dev --inspect src/main.ts
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --quiet --no-stdin --watch src --ext ts --exec 'node --require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require node-env-dev --inspect' src/main.ts

author: Robert Laverty <roblav96@gmail.com> (https://github.com/roblav96)
